name: Far to Fall
title: Skirk: Far to Fall
in_play_description: When your Skirk has this card equipped and is on the field, when you play or Discard Void Rift: Deal 1 Cryo DMG to the opponent's active character. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Skirk to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip this to your Skirk.
When your Skirk has this card equipped and is on the field, when you play or Discard Void Rift: Deal 1 Cryo DMG to the opponent's active character. (Once per Round)
(You must have Skirk in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
